#summary Global Project Specifications
#labels Featured

== Technical Parameters ==

*Note base:* 31.0<br>
*DFT input format:* .wav, 44.1kHZ 16-bit stereo, first 56 bytes clipped (combined into a mono channel for analysis)<br>
*DFT Amplitude Cutoff*: 2 ^ 2.0<br>
*DFT output format:* see [DFTFolder DFT/main.c], min/max processing already done<br>
*Time step:* 5ms<br>
